author: Roger Palmieri
comment: So far the best free app. It has all the set up needed, lacking accuracy for distances as well as altitude...seems that when changing location with a different altitude there is an offset that takes time to happen? The voice does not match with the logged data, still give 5 because it is the best I found.
title: Good one

author: Pan Talon
comment: I used to use Endomondo but after buying Ant+ speed and cadence sensor I wasn't able to make it work. With this app I run both BLE HRM and ANT+ Garmin Speed@Cadence sensor and it works well so I brought full version.
title: Excellent app

author: Lance King
comment: Used it today for the first time, and well I was rather impressed but a few problems. The GPS data for speed was up and down constantly. I compared this to a garmin GPS and I was easy 2km/hr fast at live speeds but my average speeds where spot on and th e distance. So nothing wrong with my phone. Perhaps something to look into. Also perhaps atleast a demo version of the full app could be worth it in the long run.
title: GPS live speeds very jumpy and inaccurate

author: Jake Ekaj
comment: Inaccurate, inconsistent gps reporting. As an example, it indicated I was going 0.0 mph for a distance of .2 miles for 30 minutes, even though an app with the same function had no issues   I changed my gps settings from "high" to "device only," restarted the app, uninstalled and reinstalled; no change.  It is totally unreliable. I could work with the app if support would work with me, but support did not respond after I emailed for assistance.  Seems like whoever is responsible doesn't have a clue.

author: Wombat K
comment: Application licensing fails if you change sims when travelling. Does not come back when old sim restored. No response from support ... doesn't exist ?
title: Non existent support

author: Harry Glass
comment: I am baffled by this app! I set it up as instructed. I enjoyed the gym workout on the elliptical with my Polar Beat bluetooth chest strap on. The app tracked my entire workout and told me every minute the time of the workout, the heart rate, whether it was fat burning, aerobic or anaerobic, and the calories burned. I thought it was great. After the workout, I tried to view it and it wasn't there. There was no workout that I could find. I went to the website and there was nothing. WTF!! It looks like an App, it sounds like an App, but it seems to be Crap. There's no help feature and no customer support. It's a big fat nothing! They talk a good game though!  I guess the bottom line is that the App I used is the "free" App, but to get the be paid via PayPal.free app to do what the website says it can do, $5 must must be paid via PayPal. Huh????.

author: jim roy
comment: Don't know yet how well it all works, but everything I want is here and well organized.  Finally a workout tracker focused first on giving me info rather than selling me accessories & building a mailing list. Best replacement for My Tracks I've found.
title: Great first impression

author: Rob Merrifield
comment: My email address was too long. Never had this problem anywhere else. Fix it, explain what I am doing wrong, let me use the app and I will reconsider my rating.

author: Daniel Radu Finică
comment: "perfect" though I ran today 21 km (internațional Half-marathon in Bucharest) and shows me 63 calories. Everything else is as it should be. Profile set correctly.
title: Wow

author: Barb O
comment: I have had this app, worked fantastic!  They updated, i can't sync my watch, tried update and reinstall and lost all info, still won't sync and nobody will help me!  Tried messaging via fb and site.  What happened to this app?!  Only one i could use, not working now and NO communication from company.  Nice job.

author: Stephen Pierce
comment: Works great for all workouts and works well with smartwatch too!
title: Fantastic app!

author: Sergi Ouh
comment: I have been using this app for some years and I can say that it is almost perfect. It has been ahead of many other popular apps since like 5 years. Underrated for what you get and now for Free!!!
title: Love it

author: Mark Masloski
comment: It works with my polar Bluetooth heart rate strap. I use the pro version and I absolutely love that I can customize the dashboard in order to see the live stats that are the most important to my workout.   I also like the fact that you can upload your workouts to the cloud so you don't loose track.   I really appreciate that it allows you to use Karvonen heart rate information rather than just the standard "average' methods. I can feel confident that my heart rate zones are more accurate to my own fitness levels because I have been tested for those numbers.  It's a great app....seriously!

author: S Yasin
comment: Need to be able to give option to show sensor speed along side map. Does either map with gps speed or other option is sensor speed without maps. Also adding function of route planning would be useful.
title: Good app but ...

author: jas perth
comment: I have lost previous saved tracks when upgrading to the latest version. Not impressed.
title: Upgrade wipe

author: A Google User
comment: Replied to my email instantly for support. Edit: Calorie counter is not working :(
title: excellent customer support.

author: Rio Wong
comment: Demo mode is so good! But I prefer km/h unit could be optionally announced. Voice feedback sounds nothing in live run

author: Pascal Macaigne
comment: Don't use this app

author: Aurelio Vieira
comment: Great App Working without any problems with an Ant+ heart rate device.

author: Mauri Galvez
comment: Weak UI, limited abilities

author: Drak Thomasson
comment: Won't record calories no matter how I set it up!

author: Ramil Macahilas
comment: Really great app. Supports on sensor is also suberb..i highly recommend this for cyclists like myself
title: Great App

author: Bob Robertson
comment: not very intuitive

author: rajat bagadthey
comment: would be complete if you would include 2 minute heart rate recovery

author: Harold Hong
comment: Using this for 2years now

author: sunil Ghorpade
comment: Super app.  User friendly.  👍
title: Super

author: Alen Babačić
comment: Working good

author: Ig Bross
title: need to log in to use

author: James H
comment: Worked the first time I paired it with my heart rate monitor. The 2nd time it took me about 10 minutes of force closing and restarting the app. Now it won't work at all - it connects but then as soon as you press 'back' in order to start your work out it just deconnects. Very disappointing!
title: Didn't work with my HRM

author: Wellington Amaral
comment: This is the best app for tracking HR during workouts - by far.  That said, a major issue has gone unaddressed: while I'm using this app with a Polar chest band, the app will regardlessly activate the sensors on my Android Wear smartwatch, hence needlessly draining my watch battery.  There should be a simple option within the settings to keep the app from activating smartwatch sensor, either manually, or automatically when a chest band is detected.
title: The best app for monitoring HR during training, BUT...

author: Ron Chen
comment: I can't believe how well this app works!  I have a Moto X and had problems with my Polar H7 maintaining connection with other apps like Polar Beat and Pear.  I was a user of Endomondo but now use this... The audible announcements and customizable training plans are what set this app apart from other more popular apps.  1/9/2014:  Over the last couple of days, I experienced erratic behavior with ALL heart monitor related apps.  At first I thought that it had something to do with my Polar H7, but I'm pretty certain that it had to do with the most recent update to Motorola Connect (standard software on my Moto X).  The software had updated automatically on 1/7, just around the time that I started having problems.  After uninstalling all updates to Motorola Connect, everything works perfectly.
title: Awesome!!

author: One Man Peloton
comment: Detected but not able to connect
title: Garmin GSC10 speed/cadence sensor problem

author: Chip Webb
comment: Lost all of my past workout data when the app updated
title: Deleted all of my data

author: Darren Hardy
comment: I just updated the app and all my tracks are gone!!!
title: Deleted all my tracks

author: Jan Dorko
comment: Best tracker I've tried

author: Brent Rivers
comment: I've been a user since you began and there are no other apps (that i've yet found) that will allow the customization of audible notifications at various interval settings or that maintain connection with my H7 HRM.  I could give a rip about social connectivity and "connecting" with people for my workouts and your app allows tracking of the pertinent factors.   I hope I can still use the app even if you have to shut down the service.
title: PLEASE Don't Shut it Down

author: daniel brookes
comment: After plenty of research this is the best app out there that will pick up all my ant+ bike sensors plus garmin heart rate monitor and log it all via the app and website. Will be a real shame if sportstracker goes out of business!
title: Best ant+ tracker! Don't close down!

author: A Google User
comment: I can not believe this gorgeous application is coming to end. You can not let that to happen.I am using it for years and still can not find new to replace it. Keep fighinng to keep this application running no matter what. Big support.
title: Keep fighting

author: Luke Brown
comment: Its a shame this app is shutting down. I hope someone will pick up this company and continue the good work they have started.
title: Best tracker I've used.

author: Tim Mckimm
comment: Can't find any that give me the simple readouts I want. I only work out in a gym so I don't need maps and everything. Do wish they would partner up with myfitnesspal though that would be perfect
title: Best app
